subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The Brazilian midfielder Kaká decided to stay with A.C. Milan, ending talks over a record-breaking transfer bid from Manchester City reported to be worth $147 million. Kaká, FIFA’s player of the year in 2007 after leading A.C. Milan to the European Champions League title, is under contract through 2013.
